element.title: Windowframe
element.longdescription:
Note: Redmond components are deprecated. Please consider using LZ Components. If you use this component, you must explicitly include the redmond library:
<include href="redmond"/>

Description:
The windowframe tag provides a standard beveled-frame box. This tag is one in a set of compatible window elements are also available for building Redmond windows.

Example:
See window

See also:
tabpanelview, tabview, window, windowtext
